article_title: Jennifer Lawrence Surprised Kids At A Montreal Hospital And It Was Awesome
article_text:
Jennifer Lawrence brightened spirits on Friday when she visited patients at Shriners Hospital for Children in Montreal.

The actress, who's in the city filming the next installment of the "X-Men" franchise, took some time out of her schedule to meet with the kids, take pictures and chat with staff members.

The hospital shared some photos from her visit on its Facebook page, writing, "A very special visitor stopped by our Canada hospital today. Jennifer Lawrence is in Montreal filming a new movie and she made time to visit some of our #ShrinersCanada kids and staff. Everyone had a great time!”

article_metadata.description: The actress took time out of filming "X-Men" to visit patients and staff.

Jennifer Lawrence is in Montreal filming a new movie and she made time to visit some of our #ShrinersCanada kids and staff.
The hospital shared some photos from her visit on its Facebook page, writing, "A very special visitor stopped by our Canada hospital today.
The actress, who's in the city filming the next installment of the "X-Men" franchise, took some time out of her schedule to meet with the kids, take pictures and chat with staff members.
Everyone had a great time!”
